item.title: Hello World
item.description: My first publication is more “why” this blog and going directly to the point is to share experience and knowledge in this fast change tech world. A lot of people who I’ve been following always said the same thing shared knowledge, write about your experience and the environment that you experienced and which tecnologies are you using today and now I’m starting my own jorney here. This is not my first blog, I really like to write, my first blog still on-line and was about shows and rock bands in my home town, because of my lack of time I ended for leaving but if you wanna take a look rock-ce.
